Room.Name: Oceanview Drive/Rosecrest Street Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Rosecrest Street and Oceanview Drive.
Room.LongDescription: The wide and scenic Oceanview Drive continues to the north and south of this intersection, while Rosecrest Street will take you through the business area of the city. Rosecrest Street changes direction a few times, and along here it takes an east-west route. It eventually runs north and south again, and in fact it runs past the west side of Lyanden Castle at the northern end.
